mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_양식기본 조회 (FormMapper.getForm) */ SELECT form_sn ,task_cd ,form_nm ,form_path ,use_yn ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_FORM" WHERE 1=1 AND form_sn = #{formSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_양식기본 수정 (FormMapper.updateForm) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_FORM" SET task_cd = coalesce(#{taskCd}, task_cd) ,form_nm = coalesce(#{formNm}, form_nm) ,form_path = coalesce(#{formPath}, form_path) ,use_yn = coalesce(#{useYn}, use_yn) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND form_sn = #{formSn}
